name: Clothing Store
description:
This project is an experiment focused on customization mechanics, developed in C# for Unity.

Clothing Store is a game scene, placed inside a clothing store, in which you can buy new clothes for your character.

It may receive updates soon.
The map was built using tilemap objects and the artwork (tileset) was downloaded from itch.io, on a free version, https://gif-superretroworld.itch.io/interior-pack.

The player character was downloaded from Open Game Art, also free assets, https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-character-bases.
